#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	
	int notest;
	cin>>notest;
	string str1, str2;
	bool forw, bkw ;
	for(int test=0; test<notest; test++){
		
		forw = false;
		bkw = false;
		cin>>str1>>str2;
		int len1 = str1.length();
		int len2 = str2.length();
		int j=0;
		for(int i=0; i<len1; i++){
			
			if(str1[i] == str2[j])
				j++;
			
			if( j==len2 )
				break;
		}
		
		if( j==len2)
			forw = true;



		j=len2-1;
		for(int i=0; i<len1; i++){
			
			if(str1[i] == str2[j])
				j--;
		
			if(j==-1)
				break;
		}
		
		if( j==-1)
			bkw = true;		
		
		
		if( forw && bkw)
			cout<<3<<endl;
		else if(  bkw)
			cout<<2<<endl;
		else if( forw)
			cout<<1<<endl;
		else
			cout<<0<<endl;
		
		
		
	}
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
}
